This bee can be found in the nether living in [nether fortress bricks](nether-bricks-nest). It will happily live in a hive when offered the chance.

Creates [Magmatic Combs](comb#magmatic) which processed in a [Centrifuge](centrifuge) will produce magma cream.

When disturbed it will vomit lava on their foe.
